title: Highest Net Secondary Income
description: In 2023, India had the highest net secondary income in the world, amounting to $101.9 billion.

title: Highest Net Current Transfers from Abroad
description: India received the highest net current transfers from abroad in 2023, totaling $106.5 billion.

title: Lowest Average Transaction Cost for Remittances
description: In 2023, India had the lowest average transaction cost for sending remittances, at just 0.54%.

title: High Prevalence of Low-Birthweight Babies
description: In 2020, 27.4% of births in India were low-birthweight, one of the highest rates globally.

title: High Prevalence of Wasting in Children
description: In 2020, 18.7% of children under 5 in India were affected by wasting, the highest prevalence in the world.

title: High Prevalence of Severe Wasting in Children
description: In 2020, 7.5% of children under 5 in India suffered from severe wasting, the highest rate globally.
